scripts.build: npm run build:package ; npm run build:bundle-nomodule
scripts.build:bundle-nomodule: cd src ; (for f in MuBinder.ts MuRouter.ts MuUIDs.ts MuWidget.ts StrParser.ts MuLabelFor.ts utils/JSONS.ts; do echo ''; cat $f ; done ) | node ../trim-eximport.js > ../dist/MuWidget-bundle.ts ; tsc --target ES2015 ../dist/MuWidget-bundle.ts #; rm ../dist/MuWidget-bundle.ts
scripts.build:bundle-module: cd src ; tsc --target ES2016 --outFile ../dist/MuWidget-bundle-module.js MuBinder.ts MuRouter.ts MuUIDs.ts MuWidget.ts StrParser.ts MuLabelFor.ts
